title: Senior Front-end Developer
description:
As a senior front end developer, I am responsible for maintaining applications at the highest standard and stability for our 22.000 active customers on the platform can perform pension calculations and more. My main responsibilities are:

  • Development of features
  • Implementation of SEO techniques
  • Bug fixes
  • Code refactoring
  • Architecture planning

  • Implementation of improvements in the Conquer Plus platform
  • Implementation of codes in order to improve the performance of the Conquer Plus platform

title: Co-Founder and Senior Front-end developer
description: As company partner and front-end developer, my objectives are giving the best of usability, performance and code. Make companies life easier is our goal, and growing with quality is out focus.

title: Mobile Developer
description:
I acted as the main developer of the DoBank app during the time I was present at the company. It's made in React Native and we use the latest tech options to ensure the best security, experience and usability for the user. We consume the API using GraphQL and a few more things. The main points of this activity are:

  • Development of features in the app
  • Screen development
  • API consumption with GraphQL
